capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Snape's family history and it's actually pretty fascinating. He comes from a mixed-blood wizarding family, which is quite unique in the Harry Potter world. His mother was Merope Gaunt, a member of the dark wizarding family, while his father was Tobias Snape, a Muggle. I think it's interesting how this blend of bloodlines influenced Snape's personality and behavior throughout the series.
